description: Try our easy to follow Roast Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roast Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup olive oil (or melted duck fat)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut potatoes into evensized pieces. Place into a large saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil and cook for 5 minutes or until just tender but not cooked through. Drain well and roughen the surface by returning to the pan and giving them a good shake.

Toss with oil or duck fat, rosemary leaves and season well with sea salt flakes and cracked black pepper. Place the potatoes into a roasting pan in a single layer. Cook in a preheated oven at 200Â°C for 4560 minutes or until crisp and golden, turning occasionally. Serve.
